pr_title: Add ITs for JVM old gen policy

timeline.message: Add ITs for JVM old gen policy. Retrieve persisted actions list from Rest endpoint

timeline.author: yojs

timeline.bodyText: Can we make this as an util class or rename as CacheClearActionSummary?
timeline.author: sruti1312

replies.bodyText: Since this Summary is only used as a Json container within each action class(similar to the Builder class within the action class), I would like to leave it as it is. We can make them as separate classes if needed in the future
replies.author: rguo-aws

timeline.bodyText: This is fixed with Sid's PR. We dont need to add them here
timeline.author: sruti1312

replies.bodyText: thanks for catching this. Yes. let me remove those in my next PRs(I am creating a few more ITs to cover corner cases in JVM decider)
replies.author: rguo-aws

timeline.bodyText: I see that you have updated OLD_GEN to HEAP. The method says getMaxOldGenSizeOrDefault. Is there a reason why this change was made? Do we want to rename the method?
timeline.author: sruti1312

replies.bodyText: yes, this was a bug I found in old gen RCA. Heap usage is supposed to be calculated by (old gen usage)/(max total heap size). but for some reason, we calculated it by (old gen usage)/(max old gen size)
replies.author: rguo-aws

replies.bodyText: done. added a new function to retrieve HEAP and leave the OLD_GEN unchanged
replies.author: rguo-aws
